Posts.Content: I have not posted on here before but have been so great full for all the wonderful words of wisdom from those of you who have as it has helped me over the past few weeks while waiting for my mastectomy for high grade, wide spread DCIS.Â  I just had to respond to this as it is such a great idea. Bravo leolady, thank you for encouragement and inspiration. x
Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness
